name: Cuddlies Vs. A.liens
description:
Cuddlies Vs. Aliens is a tiny Tower Defense game  where you  fight off an invasion of 8-bit aliens by assembling the powers of the woodland creatures.

The current version is a demo of the work in progress



Current Features
  • Place cuddly creatures to fight off the aliens 🦊️
  • Multiple animals and enemies with unique characteristics 🎲️
  • Retro art style, modern game mechanics 👾️
  • Made with pico-8

Roadmap

  • Tower upgrades ⬆️
  • Multiple levels with unique mechanics 🌴️
  • Music 🎶️
  • General polish 💅️
  • When will it be done?
    February 2022!
  • How much will it cost?
    It will be free, but any donations are appreciated!
  • Can I play in a higher resolution?
    No, that's part of the charm 😋️
  • What's this Pico-8 you keep going on about?
    It is the game engine we used, which emulates 80's hardware. It's great fun and available here in Itch,io, Have a look for yourself.
